landing.title: Search across the OpenITI corpus in one place.
landing.description: A focused entry point for exploring Arabic and Islamicate texts, authors, places, and eras. Type a keyword, a person, or a title and start mapping the literary record.
landing.helper: Start broad, then filter by region, period, or collection.
landing.examples: Try: Qawacid Fiqhiyya, Ma Hiya Sinima, ودمع كسح

search.title: Explore matches across the OpenITI corpus.
search.statsDescription: Your query surfaced passages across authors, periods, and regions.
search.warningQdrantFallback: Vector engine unavailable; automatically fell back to BM25.
search.facetsBm25Only: Facet counts are available in BM25 mode only.
